bug.author: oulutan
bug.summary: 3D Convolutional Layers not included in __init__ files
bug.description: I am not able to import conv_3d and 3d pooling layers. When I checked the __ init __.py files for both the tflearn folder and the layers folder, I realized 3D layers aren't included in those files. Is this intentional? Are those layers ready to use?

comments.comment: Yes they are working, we just forgot to add them into init file! If you want, you can make a pull request to add it, and I will merge it :) Or I will update the code later.
